title: She's Out
brief_description: Dolly Rawlins is free again. She has served the eight year prison sentence for her husband’s murder and is now set to collect the six million pounds worth of diamonds that she stashed before she was sent down. The money will enable her to follow her dreams and start a new life. But her former cell mates have their own ideas…

constellations_other.name: Women, crime and literature
constellations_other.description: Judy & Punch draws on a classic puppet show that's been reframed by director Mirrah Foulkes as a feminist tale, much like the works that put women at the centre in this Constellation.
